---
title: "Speed analysis using lineprof"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(lineprof)
library(kgschart)
l <- lineprof(kgschart(system.file("extdata/leela-ja_JP.png",
                                   package = "kgschart")))
l
```

"rgb_dist" function used to be a bottleneck, which has become much faster now.
```{r}
kgschart:::rgb_dist
```
